Package org.world.agents.enemies.AI

Class Point

java.lang.Object
org.world.agents.enemies.AI.Point
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
Implements a 2D point that is used in pathfinding The coordinates point to the center of a tile

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Point​(int x, int y, Point parent)
    Creates a point with given coordinates and parent Assumes the coordinates it receives are valid in the current game world, does not check for out of bounds conditions
